Method Detail

findSubstitutions

public static SubstitutionList findSubstitutions(Conjunction conjunction,
                                                 State state,
                                                 Substitution alpha,
                                                 AxiomSet axioms,
                                                 boolean all,
                                                 boolean negation)
Finds the possible Substitution s for a task.

Parameters:
conjunction - the Conjunction of Literals.
state - the current State of the world.
alpha - the previous Substitution done.
axioms - the AxiomSet.
all - the flag indicating that all Substitution s must be found.
negation - the flag indicating that negation are used to define Problem.
Returns:
the possible Substitution s for the preconditions of a task.
